channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Tivoli Netcool Impact
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Tivoli Netcool Impact

item.title: CVE-2021-29794|2024-09-17T03:38:07.991Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool/Impact 7.1.0.20 and 7.1.0.21 uses an insecure SSH server configuration which enables weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 203556.

item.title: CVE-2020-4239|2024-09-17T01:30:53.294Z -- ibm -- tivoli%20netcool%20impact
item.description: IBM Tivoli Netcool Impact 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.0.17 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 175412.
